Text: Madura is an Indonesian island off the northeastern coast of Java.

<Text: Madura Island:  It is separated from Java by the narrow Strait of Madura.>

Text: Madura Island:  The administered area has a density of 702 people per km², while that of the island itself (3,630,000 people in 2012 count) is higher at 817/km².
